title: fexkomin
author: fexkomin
content: We Creating New Design & WebsiteFexkomin Web Development & StoreWe help individuals and businesses achieve massive growth by enhancing their online presence through website development and digital marketing strategies.Our Services Web Design Services Landing & Dashboard Template Creating and uploading to your website E-commerce online store template making Graphic Design (Banner & Logo & Cover & Profile etc...) Creating Website With Domain and Unlimited Web Hosting All Plugin & Theme Integrations Includes project elements/icons/fontsProfessional work HTML5 & CSS3 & JAVASCRIPT & REACT High Quality Graphics Clean Source Code Search Engine optimization We increase your Pagespeed values Mobile Friendly Design 24/7 Customer Support Cross Browser CompatibilityPopular Softwares Support Adlinkfly Template & Development Services Vie Faucet Template & Development Services Ptc Evolution Template & Development Services GoldCoders HYIP Template & Development Services CMS(WordPress,Joomla etc...) Template & Development ServicesAdlinkfly Theme (6)Faucet Script (2)Ptc Addons (2)PTC Evolution (4)Ptc Script (3)Ptc Theme (4)Vie Faucet Addons (3)Vie Faucet V3 Theme (With Script) (Vie Faucet V4 ThemePlease message me before placing an order, We will be happy to discuss your project. Thank you!Check Our PortfolioWe have experience of large range projects, including but not limited to a Business website, crypto website,faucet website,adlinkfly website,ptc evolution website, hyip website,investment website, blog, e-commerce and many more.Telegram ContactWhatsapp Contact

comments.author: fexkomin
comments.body: Our portfolio showcases a collection of our past work and projects we have completed. It provides a glimpse into our expertise and capabilities in various industries.Thank you for considering our services. We invite you to review our portfolio and please feel free to contact us if you are interested in working with us.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP I must commend you for a good presentation although it would have been much better if actually all your introduction were in one page well arranged and coordinated.  Your portfolio is quite interesting as I see you already have the experience with lots of jobs executed. You can still edit your introduction and put all together.  It would be nice you mention your means of payment for services rendered so that the community would see for themselves as anybody approaching you would already know what is obtainable in terms of payment of services rendered.When it comes to communication, would it not be better you use this platform to conclude everything about the deal for transparency and accountability. These days telegram is not too safe and conducive for  such  discussion as people are being sceptical about any business conversation on telegram because of the fear of erasures of business chats or factual documentation against them which sometimes causes setbacks. But however continuing the conversation here will be fine and possibly both parties involved would be okay with it.

comments.author: fexkomin
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on September 05, 2023, 03:05:39 PMOP I must commend you for a good presentation although it would have been much better if actually all your introduction were in one page well arranged and coordinated.  Your portfolio is quite interesting as I see you already have the experience with lots of jobs executed. You can still edit your introduction and put all together.  It would be nice you mention your means of payment for services rendered so that the community would see for themselves as anybody approaching you would already know what is obtainable in terms of payment of services rendered.When it comes to communication, would it not be better you use this platform to conclude everything about the deal for transparency and accountability. These days telegram is not too safe and conducive for  such  discussion as people are being sceptical about any business conversation on telegram because of the fear of erasures of business chats or factual documentation against them which sometimes causes setbacks. But however continuing the conversation here will be fine and possibly both parties involved would be okay with it.Firstly thanks for comment.Bitcointalk won't let me add images to the topic. So I edited the topic and there is only text.  I guess I should be more active on the forum. And I guess you are right telegram is not secure about it. But before, I communicated with my 30+ customers via telegram. I am not malicious and I can send previous telegram chats by PM to those who want.As a result, I provide website design, website development and graphic design services. I will update the thread soon.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: fexkomin on September 05, 2023, 04:06:16 PMQuote from: CryptSafe on September 05, 2023, 03:05:39 PMOP I must commend you for a good presentation although it would have been much better if actually all your introduction were in one page well arranged and coordinated.  Your portfolio is quite interesting as I see you already have the experience with lots of jobs executed. You can still edit your introduction and put all together.  It would be nice you mention your means of payment for services rendered so that the community would see for themselves as anybody approaching you would already know what is obtainable in terms of payment of services rendered.When it comes to communication, would it not be better you use this platform to conclude everything about the deal for transparency and accountability. These days telegram is not too safe and conducive for  such  discussion as people are being sceptical about any business conversation on telegram because of the fear of erasures of business chats or factual documentation against them which sometimes causes setbacks. But however continuing the conversation here will be fine and possibly both parties involved would be okay with it.Firstly thanks for comment.Bitcointalk won't let me add images to the topic. So I edited the topic and there is only text.  I guess I should be more active on the forum. And I guess you are right telegram is not secure about it. But before, I communicated with my 30+ customers via telegram. I am not malicious and I can send previous telegram chats by PM to those who want.As a result, I provide website design, website development and graphic design services. I will update the thread soon.OP your rank here would not allow you to upload pictures or images. So the only thing you can do to make sure you are able to upload pictures is to upgrade your account to copper membership. So doing that, you can be able to upload pictures here to do your advertisement freely. However here's the link to guide you in getting a Copper membership registration  here You being active is another area of focus because members who wants to patronise your services would definitely look into your profile to see how active you are and if it happens that you are not active, they become sceptical about you and doubts would arise.Lastly, I think I should remind you of this. Payment method is another factor to put into consideration. Members here would prefer an escrow to making sure their funds are safe. They do that so as to call for transparency and accountability. No party has anything to lose  when in a safe hands such as an escrow here. The escrow must be a reputable member who is well known and not a newbie.

However here's the link to guide you in getting a Copper membership registration  here You being active is another area of focus because members who wants to patronise your services would definitely look into your profile to see how active you are and if it happens that you are not active, they become sceptical about you and doubts would arise.Lastly, I think I should remind you of this. I will be purchasing this soon.And thanks for your valuable advices.I am surprised you are saying that you had no idea as a newbie that one would need to get a copper membership registration so as to enable to them upload pictures. I was thinking initially you ignored that aspect of it though but it is nice you know about that now. This is the reason why it is emphasized that one need take or make out time to read and know more about this platform so as not to be taken unawares at any point in time. I believe if you have had knowledge about the copper membership registration, you would have done that immediately without any one telling you to do it.I like the fact that you hid to advise. It is good of you to follow instructions. Anyways, I wish you good luck as you add value in rendering services here onboard this platform.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Hey, couple advice for you. First, delete the previous bump post to stay in line with forum rules.Can you not open a separate thread for each script you resell? You have a Digital Good section for that, and you should offer them there.Also, I see that you also offer cloud mining scripts. They are used exclusively for fraud and taking money from naive people, and we don't like fraudsters here. Well, any fraudulent promotion can only lead you to negative feedback.If you have some skills, better use them for something honest.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: OP, how much would it cost me to have a duplicate of [banned mixer] ? I want everything copied, their client templates etc, can you do that? I want it under digler.io "your opportunity to the future" tell me how much.

comments.body: I don't need exact price and time, just by looking at jambler services, how much would you say it would cost to develop?
